languages.text: Каждый в Просторе узнал об измене Вольного Торговца. Расплата за сие прегрешение не заставила себя ждать — удары отмщения обрушились на протекторат фон Валанциус со всех сторон, сгубив его в мгновение ока. Было ли это важно для его бывше{mf|го|й} повелител{mf|я|ьницы}? Едва ли...

The entire Expanse heard of the Rogue Trader's betrayal. {mf|His|Her} punishment was swift. Retaliatory strikes fell on the von Valancius protectorate from all sides, obliterating it in the blink of an eye. But did that trouble its former ruler? Unlikely...
languages.original_text: Каждый в Просторе узнал об измене Вольного Торговца. Расплата за сие прегрешение не заставила себя ждать — удары отмщения обрушились на протекторат фон Валанциус со всех сторон, сгубив его в мгновение ока. Было ли это важно для его бывше{mf|го|й} повелител{mf|я|ьницы}? Едва ли...

traits.locale_text: The entire Expanse heard about the Rogue Trader's betrayal. Punishment for this transgression was swift. Retaliation strikes fell on von Valancius' protectorate, turning it into ruin in a blink. Did its former ruler care about this? One would have to doubt that...

The entire Expanse heard about the Rogue Trader's betrayal. Punishment for this transgression was swift. Retaliation strikes fell on von Valancius' protectorate, turning it into ruin in a blink. Did its former ruler care about this? One would have to doubt that...

The entire Expanse heard about the Rogue Trader's betrayal. Punishment for this transgression was swift. Retaliatory strikes fell on the von Valancius protectorate from all sides, obliterating it in the blink of an eye. But did that trouble its former ruler? It is... unlikely.

The entire Expanse heard about the Rogue Trader's betrayal. Punishment for this transgression was swift. Retaliatory strikes fell on the von Valancius protectorate from all sides, obliterating it in the blink of an eye. But did that trouble its former ruler? It is... unlikely.

The entire Expanse heard of the Rogue Trader's betrayal. {mf|His|Her} punishment was swift. Retaliatory strikes fell on the von Valancius protectorate from all sides, obliterating it in the blink of an eye. But did that trouble its former ruler? Unlikely...

The entire Expanse heard of the Rogue Trader's betrayal. {mf|His|Her} punishment was swift. Retaliatory strikes fell on the von Valancius protectorate from all sides, obliterating it in the blink of an eye. But did that trouble its former ruler? Unlikely...

languages.text: 整个科罗努斯扩区都听说了行商浪人的背叛，{mf|他|她}的恶行很快就招致了惩罚。报复性的袭击从四面八方而来，眨眼间就将冯·瓦兰修斯王朝消灭殆尽。然而，这样的结果会让它的前任统治者感到困扰吗？恐怕不太可能……
languages.original_text: The entire Expanse heard of the Rogue Trader's betrayal. {mf|His|Her} punishment was swift. Retaliatory strikes fell on the von Valancius protectorate from all sides, obliterating it in the blink of an eye. But did that trouble its former ruler? Unlikely...

traits.locale_text: 整个科罗努斯扩区都听说了行商浪人的背叛，这样的恶行很快就招致了惩罚。报复性的袭击从四面八方而来，眨眼间就将冯·瓦兰修斯王朝消灭殆尽。然而，这会让它的前统治者感到困扰吗？这显然……不太可能。

languages.text: Die gesamte Ausdehnung hörte vom Verrat {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. {mf|Seine|Ihre} Bestrafung folgte rasch. Von allen Richtungen trafen Vergeltungsschläge das Protektorat von Valancius, die es in einem einzigen Wimpernschlag auslöschten. Aber scherte das {mf|den ehemaligen Herrscher|die ehemalige Herrscherin} des Protektorats? Wohl kaum ...
languages.original_text: The entire Expanse heard of the Rogue Trader's betrayal. {mf|His|Her} punishment was swift. Retaliatory strikes fell on the von Valancius protectorate from all sides, obliterating it in the blink of an eye. But did that trouble its former ruler? Unlikely...

traits.locale_text: Die gesamte Ausdehnung hörte vom Verrat {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Die Strafe für dieses Vergehen erfolgte sofort. Von allen Richtungen trafen Vergeltungsschläge das Protektorat von Valancius, die es in einem einzigen Wimpernschlag auslöschten. Aber scherte das {mf|den ehemaligen Herrscher|die ehemalige Herrscherin} des Protektorats? Es ist ... unwahrscheinlich.

languages.text: La nouvelle de la trahison {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} se propagea à travers les Étendues. Sa punition fut expéditive. Le protectorat von Valancius fut assailli de toute part par des frappes de représailles qui l'anéantirent en un clin d'œil. Mais cela troubla-t-il son {mf|ancien dirigeant|ancienne dirigeante} ? Voilà qui paraît très improbable...
languages.original_text: The entire Expanse heard of the Rogue Trader's betrayal. {mf|His|Her} punishment was swift. Retaliatory strikes fell on the von Valancius protectorate from all sides, obliterating it in the blink of an eye. But did that trouble its former ruler? Unlikely...

traits.locale_text: La nouvelle de la trahison {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} se propagea dans toutes les Étendues. La punition pour ce crime fut expéditive. Le protectorat von Valancius fut assailli de toute part par des frappes de représailles qui l’anéantirent en un clin d'œil. Mais cela troubla-t-il son {mf|ancien dirigeant|ancienne dirigeante} ? C'est... peu probable.

languages.text: Toda la Extensión se hizo eco de la traición de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Su castigo no se hizo esperar: el protectorado von Valancius sufrió ataques en represalia desde todas las direcciones, reduciéndolo a ceniza. Pero ¿importó aquello a su antigu{mf|o|a} gobernante? Parece... improbable.
languages.original_text: The entire Expanse heard of the Rogue Trader's betrayal. {mf|His|Her} punishment was swift. Retaliatory strikes fell on the von Valancius protectorate from all sides, obliterating it in the blink of an eye. But did that trouble its former ruler? Unlikely...

traits.locale_text: Toda la Extensión se hizo eco de la traición de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. El castigo por su crimen no se hizo esperar: el protectorado von Valancius sufrió ataques en represalia desde todas las direcciones, reduciéndolo a ceniza. Pero ¿importó aquello a su antigu{mf|o|a} gobernante? Parece... improbable.

languages.text: エクスパンス全体が、自由開拓者の裏切りの知らせを耳にした。{mf|彼|彼女}に対する処罰は迅速だった。フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領は四方八方から報復攻撃を受け、瞬く間に消滅した。しかし、その事実はかつての支配者を悩ませたのだろうか？あまり考えにくいものだ…
languages.original_text: The entire Expanse heard of the Rogue Trader's betrayal. {mf|His|Her} punishment was swift. Retaliatory strikes fell on the von Valancius protectorate from all sides, obliterating it in the blink of an eye. But did that trouble its former ruler? Unlikely...

traits.locale_text: エクスパンス全体が、自由開拓者の裏切りの知らせを耳にした。{mf|彼|彼女}に対する処罰は迅速だった。フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領は四方八方から報復攻撃を受け、瞬く間に消滅した。しかし、その事実はかつての支配者を悩ませたのだろうか？あまり考えにくいものだ…

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in ihanetini tüm Enginlik duydu. Cezası da hızla verildi. Von Valancius protektorasına dört bir yandan misilleme saldırıları geldi. Protektora, göz açıp kapayıncaya kadar ortadan kaldırıldı. Bu durum, protektoranın eski hükümdarına sorun teşkil etti mi peki? Pek sayılmaz.
languages.original_text: The entire Expanse heard of the Rogue Trader's betrayal. {mf|His|Her} punishment was swift. Retaliatory strikes fell on the von Valancius protectorate from all sides, obliterating it in the blink of an eye. But did that trouble its former ruler? Unlikely...

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'in ihanetini tüm Enginlik duydu. Cezası da hızla verildi. Von Valancius protektorasına dört bir yandan misilleme saldırıları geldi ve protektora göz açıp kapayıncaya kadar ortadan kaldırıldı. Peki bu onun eski hükümdarı için bir sorun teşkil etmiş miydi? Pek sayılmaz.
